definitions.definition: Crocks or earthenware vessels , especially domestic utensils , collectively .
Dishes , plates , and similar tableware collectively, usually made of some ceramic material , used for serving food on and eating from.

main_definition: Crocks or earthenware vessels , especially domestic utensils , collectively .
secondary_definitions: Dishes , plates , and similar tableware collectively, usually made of some ceramic material , used for serving food on and eating from.
